title: 1 dead, 3 injured in Greenville County shooting
content:
One person was fatally wounded and three others were shot in a flurry of gunfire during a home invasion Sunday afternoon in southern Greenville County, authorities said.
The Sheriff's Office responded to a report of a robbery about 4 p.m. Sunday in the 200 block of Eastview Road in Pelzer.
One person was found lying in the front yard of a residence with a gunshot wound, Lt. Ty Miller said. One gunshot victim was transported to Greenville Memorial Hospital by helicopter, the Sheriff's Office said. Two other gunshot victims were also transported to the hospital. The three individuals suffered serious injuries, Miller said.
The Coroner's Office has not released the name of the decedent.
Investigators interviewed witnesses and neighbors Sunday evening.
The Sheriff's Office has not released a description of a suspect or suspects. No arrests have been reported.
Authorities believe it was an isolated incident.
Anyone with information is asked to contact Crime Stoppers at 23-CRIME.
